humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that there is no evidence of metastasis in the sentinel lymph node (0/1) and in 7 additional lymph nodes (0/7). This information aligns with New Rule 11 and Rule 8, which state that N0 indicates no metastatic carcinoma in all assessed lymph nodes. Therefore, the N stage for this patient's cancer is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that there is no evidence of metastasis in the sentinel lymph node (0/1) and in 7 additional lymph nodes (0/7) that were resected. Therefore, the pathologic N stage for this patient is N0.
